name: Arcticmind Remastered
description:
Arcticmind Remastered is a survival game set on a post-apocalyptic winter island where you have to explore the world, search for supplies, and fight for your life. You'll need to keep warm, find food, and stay alive in this harsh environment .

  • Variety of weapons, pickups, and enemies.
  • Explore a vast, open world with realistic weather.
  • Fight off monsters and other survivors.
  • Find food and supplies to keep yourself alive.
  • Fight for your life against the cold, hunger, and other beings.

Minimum

Recomended4 GB4 GBNVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080Intel Core 2 Duo T7250Intel Core i5-2300File Size: 3GB3GB

This game is currently in development and will be released for PC In 2022/23

This demo is in very early development and does not represent the final product.
